DungeonBuddy_Config.02: Dungeon Buddy will follow you in dungeons.
DungeonBuddy_Config.04: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about treasure.
DungeonBuddy_Config.06: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about treasure in the Mines.
DungeonBuddy_Config.08: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about treasure in Quarry Mine.
DungeonBuddy_Config.10: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about treasure in Skull Cavern.
DungeonBuddy_Config.12: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about treasure in Volcano Dungeon.
DungeonBuddy_Config.14: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about barrels and crates in Mines and Skull Cavern.
DungeonBuddy_Config.17: Dungeon Buddy will alert about ostrich eggs in Volcano Dungeon.
DungeonBuddy_Config.19: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about boots in Volcano Dungeon.
DungeonBuddy_Config.21: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about hats in Volcano Dungeon.
DungeonBuddy_Config.23: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about weapons in Volcano Dungeon.
DungeonBuddy_Config.25: Dungeon Buddy will no longer alert about common chests in Volcano Dungeon.
DungeonBuddy_Config.27: Dungeon Buddy will alert the player when a ladder/hole already exists on the level.
